name: Ext_R2_ImplementationGuide_pa_re_exampleFor
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.ImplementationGuide.package.resource.exampleFor for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents ImplementationGuide.package.resource.exampleFor from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ImplementationGuide|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Resource this is an example of (if applicable)
element.definition: Another resource that this resource is an example for. This is mostly used for resources that are included as examples of StructureDefinitions.
element.comment: `ImplementationGuide.package.resource.exampleFor` maps to R4 `ImplementationGuide.definition.resource.example[x]`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `ImplementationGuide.package.resource.exampleFor` maps to R4 `ImplementationGuide.definition.resource.example[x]`.
